event.description: Adam Frazier flies out to left fielder Andrew Benintendi.
Starling Marte grounds out, second baseman Dustin Pedroia to first baseman Mitch Moreland.
Andrew McCutchen flies out to center fielder Jackie Bradley.
Gregory Polanco singles on a ground ball to center fielder Jackie Bradley.
With David Freese batting, Gregory Polanco caught stealing 2nd base, catcher Sandy Leon to second baseman Dustin Pedroia.
David Freese singles on a ground ball to pitcher Rick Porcello.
Francisco Cervelli walks. David Freese to 2nd.
Josh Bell flies out to left fielder Andrew Benintendi.
Josh Harrison strikes out swinging.
Jordy Mercer grounds out, third baseman Pablo Sandoval to first baseman Mitch Moreland.
Adam Frazier singles on a sharp ground ball to right fielder Mookie Betts.
Starling Marte pops out to second baseman Dustin Pedroia.
Andrew McCutchen strikes out on a foul tip.
Gregory Polanco grounds out, second baseman Dustin Pedroia to first baseman Mitch Moreland.
David Freese flies out sharply to center fielder Jackie Bradley.
Francisco Cervelli lines out sharply to center fielder Jackie Bradley.
Josh Bell pops out to third baseman Pablo Sandoval in foul territory.
Josh Harrison grounds out sharply, shortstop Xander Bogaerts to first baseman Mitch Moreland.
Jordy Mercer called out on strikes.
Adam Frazier reaches on a throwing error by third baseman Pablo Sandoval.
Starling Marte flies out to center fielder Jackie Bradley.
Andrew McCutchen strikes out swinging.
Gregory Polanco called out on strikes.
David Freese singles on a ground ball to shortstop Xander Bogaerts.
Francisco Cervelli doubles (1) on a sharp fly ball to left fielder Andrew Benintendi. David Freese to 3rd.
Josh Bell grounds out softly, pitcher Rick Porcello to first baseman Mitch Moreland.
Josh Harrison singles on a sharp ground ball to left fielder Andrew Benintendi. David Freese scores. Francisco Cervelli to 3rd.
Pitching Change: Matt Barnes replaces Rick Porcello.
Jordy Mercer singles on a line drive to center fielder Jackie Bradley. Francisco Cervelli scores. Josh Harrison to 2nd.
With Adam Frazier batting, wild pitch by Matt Barnes, Josh Harrison to 3rd. Jordy Mercer to 2nd.
Adam Frazier walks.
Starling Marte out on a sacrifice fly to left fielder Andrew Benintendi. Josh Harrison scores.
Andrew McCutchen strikes out swinging, catcher Sandy Leon to first baseman Mitch Moreland.
Pitching Change: Robby Scott replaces Matt Barnes.
Gregory Polanco grounds out, second baseman Dustin Pedroia to first baseman Mitch Moreland.
Pitching Change: Heath Hembree replaces Robby Scott.
David Freese flies out to center fielder Jackie Bradley.
Francisco Cervelli grounds out, shortstop Xander Bogaerts to first baseman Mitch Moreland.
Pitching Change: Craig Kimbrel replaces Heath Hembree.
Josh Bell doubles (1) on a fly ball to center fielder Jackie Bradley.
Josh Harrison strikes out swinging.
Jordy Mercer strikes out swinging.
Adam Frazier hit by pitch.
Starling Marte pops out to first baseman Mitch Moreland in foul territory.
Dustin Pedroia grounds out sharply, shortstop Jordy Mercer to first baseman Josh Bell.
Andrew Benintendi strikes out on a foul tip.
Mookie Betts lines out to left fielder Adam Frazier.
Hanley Ramirez singles on a soft line drive to center fielder Starling Marte.
Mitch Moreland strikes out swinging.
Xander Bogaerts grounds into a double play, second baseman Josh Harrison to shortstop Jordy Mercer to first baseman Josh Bell. Hanley Ramirez out at 2nd.
Jackie Bradley grounds out sharply, second baseman Josh Harrison to first baseman Josh Bell.
Pablo Sandoval lines out to left fielder Adam Frazier.
Sandy Leon grounds out, second baseman Josh Harrison to first baseman Josh Bell.
Dustin Pedroia grounds out, second baseman Josh Harrison to first baseman Josh Bell.
Andrew Benintendi flies out to left fielder Adam Frazier in foul territory.
Mookie Betts walks.
Hanley Ramirez lines out to center fielder Starling Marte.
Mitch Moreland grounds out, third baseman David Freese to first baseman Josh Bell.
Xander Bogaerts flies out to right fielder Andrew McCutchen.
Jackie Bradley triples (1) on a sharp line drive to right fielder Andrew McCutchen.
Pablo Sandoval singles on a ground ball to shortstop Jordy Mercer. Jackie Bradley scores.
Sandy Leon singles on a bunt ground ball to pitcher Gerrit Cole. Pablo Sandoval to 2nd.
Dustin Pedroia singles on a ground ball to center fielder Starling Marte. Pablo Sandoval scores. Sandy Leon to 2nd.
Andrew Benintendi homers (1) on a fly ball to right center field. Sandy Leon scores. Dustin Pedroia scores.
Mookie Betts singles on a sharp ground ball to shortstop Jordy Mercer. Mookie Betts advances to 2nd, on a throwing error by shortstop Jordy Mercer.
Hanley Ramirez pops out to second baseman Josh Harrison.
Pitching Change: Juan Nicasio replaces Gerrit Cole.
Mitch Moreland grounds out, second baseman Josh Harrison to first baseman Josh Bell.
Xander Bogaerts singles on a sharp ground ball to center fielder Starling Marte, deflected by pitcher Juan Nicasio.
Jackie Bradley grounds out, second baseman Josh Harrison to first baseman Josh Bell. Xander Bogaerts to 2nd.
With Pablo Sandoval batting, Xander Bogaerts steals (1) 3rd base.
Pablo Sandoval strikes out swinging.
Pitching Change: Felipe Rivero replaces Juan Nicasio.
Sandy Leon singles on a line drive to center fielder Starling Marte.
Dustin Pedroia called out on strikes.
Andrew Benintendi flies out to left fielder Adam Frazier.
Mookie Betts grounds into a force out, shortstop Jordy Mercer to second baseman Josh Harrison. Sandy Leon out at 2nd.
Pitching Change: Daniel Hudson replaces Felipe Rivero.
Hanley Ramirez strikes out swinging.
Mitch Moreland strikes out swinging.
Xander Bogaerts singles on a line drive to left fielder Adam Frazier.
With Jackie Bradley batting, Xander Bogaerts steals (2) 2nd base.
Jackie Bradley walks.
Pablo Sandoval strikes out swinging.
